issue.title: [C++][FlightRPC] Inconsistent use of int, int32_t, uint32_t for SqlInfo enum values
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17558](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17558). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
These should all be uint32_t, always. Not a big deal in practice at least.
